text: Tilley is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Arthur Augustus Tilley (1851–1942), academic of the University of Cambridge *Benjamin Franklin Tilley (1848–1907), officer in the United States Navy *Cecil Edgar Tilley (1894 – 1973), Australian-British petrologist and geologist. *Christopher Tilley (19?? – ) British archaeologist *Edward Tilley (Mayflower passenger) (1588–1620/1), Mayflower passenger and signer of the Mayflower Compact *Jack L. Tilley (1948 – ), 12th Sergeant Major of the U. S. Army *John Tilley (Mayflower passenger) (1571 – 1621), Mayflower passenger and signer of the Mayflower Compact *Sir John Tilley (1813–1898), Secretary to the General Post Office *Sir John Anthony Cecil Tilley (1869–1952), British ambassador *Kaat Tilley (1959-2012), Belgian fashion designer *Leonard Percy de Wolfe Tilley (1870 – 1947), 21st Premier of New Brunswick *Matt Tilley (1969 – ), Australian radio presenter and comedian *Patrick Tilley (1928 – ), British science fiction author *Samuel Leonard Tilley (1818–1896), politician in the Canadas *Sandra Tilley (1943 – 1981), U.S. R&B; and soul singer *Steven Tilley (1971 – ), Speaker of the Missouri House of Representatives *Vesta Tilley (1864 – 1952), English male impersonator ==Fictional character== *Renet Tilley, character in Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
title: Tilley (surname)
